v0.9.93 complete - bug fix for notifications not showing if conversation screen is open when phone sleeps (messages were being marked read before SMS Popup could spot them).

Also added code to detect if the phone is in a call and not setting vibrate/ringtone to try and help issue with ringtone stopping.

git-svn-id: https://android-smspopup.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@74 dacd1dde-df38-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Huge update, preparing for all the new features!
-customize notifications per user
-'quick message' (store pre-set messages to auto-respond to messages)
-quick reply support (reply directly from popup)
-added service to help clear notifications properly and track sent messages (not yet complete)
-still very buggy with all new things added
-strings and help not yet updated (all localizations will need updates)
-split up layouts into 'includes' and 'stubs' for better performance and maintenance

-update manifest so that all activities handle config changes of 'orientation|keyboardHidden' (do not restart on these configuration changes)

git-svn-id: https://android-smspopup.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@147 dacd1dde-df38-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

-revert changed in TestNotificationDialogPreference (ignoring rotation config changes seems to have fixed the repeating alert upon rotate)
-added onConfigurationChanged() to main popup activity to resize (used to be handled by onCreate())
-moved popup resize to its own function (called once in onCreate() and once in onConfigurationChanged())

git-svn-id: https://android-smspopup.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@148 dacd1dde-df38-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

-update to message ID detection (now only using match on thread + message body as phones running HTC's Sense UI seem to store date differently)

git-svn-id: https://android-smspopup.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@149 dacd1dde-df38-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6
